title: MUGCLUB EXCLUSIVE: Guessing Bad Movie Lines & Taking Your Questions! | Louder with Crowder
description: Steven and the team play the a trivia game with one of the most awful movies ever made. Brian Callen and Dave Landau join and answer MugClub Q&A on how to deal with a far left family, who should run in the 2024 presidential election, what the biggest issue of our time is, and how Republicans can utilize emotion to win more political races. #moviequotes #moviereviews #leftist
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
